pageContext.claim: “These are people [John Kelly and other critics] that would love to be back in the action. And I have no interest in having them back.”
pageContext.analysis: Many former officials who were high up in the Trump administration now say the president is incompetent or worse. Former chief of staff John Kelly and others such as former Defense Secretary James Mattis, former Secretary of State Rex Tillerson and former National Security Adviser John Bolton have listed detailed criticisms. It's not a credible defense to say they are all wrong and all want their jobs back.
